title: Very chall...
description: Very challenging. Always fun to play. You won’t always win though which is what makes it fun.

title: This was o...
description: This was one of the first Modern board games that I played. It is great, no we play this weekly with my family, they hate it the first time (my bad presentation)but now it is one of our favorite games.

title: spouse: Lo...
description: spouse: Love

title: The quintessential co-op
description: This was the one that really ignited the co-op boardgame revolution with an unstoppable chain reaction.  Theme is a little too close to home nowadays, but previously it was inoffensive enough to bring in new gamers nicely.  Being a co-op helped that even more.  Still a masterpiece of game design.  Great game!

title: Genre defi...
description: Genre defining game and worthy of it, great fun and the way the AI spreads disease works maddeningly well, quite hard to beat

title: One of the...
description: One of the rare games my sister loves,I dont enjoy this sort of game a lot, but well I dont mind playing it!

title: Awesome ga...
description: Awesome game with amazing AI. It's really clever how time runs out in this game and how the whole "infection system" works. Can be a stressful game but it is always a joy to play.

title: 2-5 player...
description: 2-5 players, 60-90 minutes, medium heavy, cooperative medical game.Excellent cooperative game, perhaps the best one out there. A lot of fun but very challenging at times, even at the easiest level. Theme is very strong and you really feel engaged to rescue the world from the outbreaks.

title: This game ...
description: This game has just been a ton of fun so far, even though we are yet to win!UPDATE: We finally won on our 5th try.UPDATE: We're 3 for 12 so far :-( This game is just super addictive!

description: Started tracking games late. Add about 10-15 to the number of plays.

title: The game t...
description: The game that really got me into the hobby.  Always a classic game to play with folks newer to hobby-style games.

title: My group h...
description: My group has had a lot of trouble winning this one consistently, but we always have fun.  Strong personalities can take control, so players need to be sensitive to allowing everyone a chance to be heard when debating strategy.

title: Love playi...
description: Love playing this my family.

title: Another co...
description: Another co-op. While I love Ghost Stories more seeing the diseases spread and the whole mechanic at work is something to behold. Base game kinda started to bore, but expansion breathed new life into this one.

title: Best strea...
description:
Best streamlined co-op. Feels very thematic to me. Love traveling the world and curing diseases. Many different roles to try.

*Upgraded to newer edition with better box art*

title: One of the...
description:
One of the best cooperative games in existence. The only reason I can't give it a 10 is because the learning curve to it is kind of steep. It can be a little overwhelming for new players, but once you get over that hump of learning, it just hums along like a smooth engine. You FEEL the tension of outbreaks lurking in hard-to-reach corners of the earth, and the action point selection makes you really consider your choices carefully. I've never had 2 games of Pandemic feel the same, and that leaves me feeling joyful when I consider playing this game.

And sweaty. Joyful sweating.

title: The tensi...
description: The tension and co-op makes this game simply sing!

title: One of the...
description: One of the first games I got and is a great one to have started with.

title: Amazing co...
description: Amazing cooperative game.  This was the first coop game I played and I enjoyed it.  It is easy to understand, and teach to non-gamers.  Plus I enjoy that the level of complexity can change based on how many epidemic cards you add in.  fantastic game that can cause some stress but always a blast to play.
